category.name: General
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: REQ_exporttoword_skip_childspecification
preference.preference_description: Controls the behavior of nested Specifications during "Export to MSWord" operations. Valid Values: * true: Nested Specifications and their sub-trees are exported to the MSWord document. * false: Nested Specifications and their sub-trees are not exported to the MSWord document. This is the default value.
